Game.Name: Animal Boxing
Game.Plot: Animal Boxing is a video game for the Nintendo DS and on DSiWare. The game involves boxing with over 50 various animals by using the touchscreen; the game is played with the DS held upside down so that the touch screen is above. In single player mode, you play as a customizable human, while in multiplayer mode, which can be played with others using Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, you play as a human.
